name: Frenzy Snowman Smasher
description:
The satanic evil snowmen are attacking. You are doomed. Your end is nigh. The only thing you can do - make it hard for them. Try to beat your local Highscore!

Controls:

  • Move by WASD or the arrow keys.
  • Point your gun towards the enemy using your mouse.
  • Shoot with the left mouse button.
  • Reload with the right mouse button.

For those who like it a bit harder: http://j.mp/LD31_FSS_Web_hard

Those are the tools we used during LD31:

  • Haxe/OpenFL/HaxeFlixel
  • FlashDevelop as our IDE
  • Google Docs for our game design document
  • Teamspeak and Hangouts for communication
  • Aseprite for pixel work
  • Cubase 5 and SFXR for music and sounds
  • git/Bitbucket for version control
  • Pizza
